type_descriptions.PING: Returns a pong message. Nothing else much?
type_descriptions.DAYCOUNTER: Reminds you how many days it has been since a set time.
type_descriptions.REDDITFETCH: Get the top post of a subreddit at the moment.
type_descriptions.QUOTEFETCH: Gets a quote from a specific category.
type_descriptions.COPYPASTATIME: Gets that sweet sweet copypasta from r/copypasta
type_descriptions.MRSHOOPASTREAMWATCH: Checks whenever MrShoopa is streaming on YouTube!
